scenes.action_text: A MOST VIOLENT YEAR Written by J.C. Chandor This film is set in New York City, 1981: Murders: 2,228 Forcible Rape: 5,405 Violent Crime: 180,235 Aggravated Assault: 60,329 Property: 1,029,749 Vehicle Theft: 133,041 Robbery: 112,273 Burglary: 360,925 Larceny-Theft: 535,783 Crime Index: 1,209,984 1981 was the most violent year in NYC history as recorded by overall Crime Index in relation to population. 2 JANUARY
